turn.context: I got stuck in an elevator for 6 hours and I was absolutely terrified!

dialogue.text: I got stuck in an elevator for 6 hours and I was absolutely terrified!
earthquakes are so scary! are you okay now?
It's scary, unless you are prepared, you're wondering how to live life without it.
at least you made it through safely, that's what matters

chain_of_empathy.emotion_cause: Experiencing fear and uncertainty due to experiencing a major earthquake.
chain_of_empathy.goal_to_response: Providing comfort and sharing similar experiences to reduce fear.

turn.context: I've been stuck in this traffic for 2 hours and I'm missing everything!

dialogue.text: I've been stuck in this traffic for 2 hours and I'm missing everything!
that's the worst! did you have it backed up anywhere?
I just needed one more hour to finish everything properly!
that's incredibly frustrating! i feel for you

chain_of_empathy.event_scenario: Being stuck in traffic during emergency.
chain_of_empathy.emotion_cause: Experiencing anger and helplessness due to being stuck in traffic during emergency.
chain_of_empathy.goal_to_response: Offering support and understanding during a difficult situation.

turn.context: My family surprised me with a visit when I was feeling really lonely!

dialogue.text: My family surprised me with a visit when I was feeling really lonely!
that's fantastic! education is such an important investment!
I don't know what I would have done without their help.
it's wonderful when people show such kindness

chain_of_empathy.emotion_cause: Feeling deep appreciation and thankfulness for receiving unexpected financial assistance.
chain_of_empathy.goal_to_response: Acknowledging the positive experience and reinforcing good feelings.

turn.context: I got stuck in an elevator for 6 hours and I was absolutely terrified!

dialogue.text: I got stuck in an elevator for 6 hours and I was absolutely terrified!
that must have been traumatic! did anyone get hurt?
The worst part was not knowing when it would come back on.
at least you made it through safely, that's what matters

chain_of_empathy.emotion_cause: Experiencing fear and uncertainty due to experiencing a major earthquake.
chain_of_empathy.goal_to_response: Providing comfort and sharing similar experiences to reduce fear.

turn.context: The earthquake was so strong, I thought the building would collapse!

dialogue.text: The earthquake was so strong, I thought the building would collapse!
getting lost is one of my worst fears! did you find your way back?
We had to melt snow for water and use candles for light.
that sounds like a real survival situation!

chain_of_empathy.event_scenario: Being stuck in an elevator for hours.
chain_of_empathy.emotion_cause: Experiencing fear and uncertainty due to being stuck in an elevator for hours.
chain_of_empathy.goal_to_response: Providing comfort and sharing similar experiences to reduce fear.
